Module openj9.dtfj
Package com.ibm.dtfj.phd.util

Class BitStream

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.dtfj.phd.util.BitStream
public final class BitStream extends Object
This class provides a mechanism for writing numbers in a bit stream.
